Title: timeSlot
Description: Round the time to the start of a half-an-hour length interval.
time — Time to round to the start of a half-an-hour length interval. DateTime/Date32/DateTime64.time_zone — A String type const value or an expression representing the time zone. String.

NoteThough this function can take values of the extended types Date32 and DateTime64 as an argument, passing it a time outside the normal range (year 1970 to 2149 for Date / 2106 for DateTime) will produce wrong results.
Returns the time rounded to the start of a half-an-hour length interval. DateTime.
